sentences.sentence: From the first to forth part: explicating phenomena of civil property disputes and lawsuits in Song Dynasty.
sentences.translation: 第一至第四章：论述宋代民间的财产纠纷与诉讼现象。

sentences.sentence: As to the nature of "Qi-People Essential", in former study it is all established as an agriculture work completely explicating producing skill.
sentences.translation: 对于《齐民要术》的性质，在以往研究中皆确定为是一本全面阐述农业生产技术的农学著作。

sentences.sentence: On the basis of explicating the connotation of technology innovation of metallurgy enterprises, the complexity and coordination features are studied.
sentences.translation: 在明确冶金企业技术创新的内涵的基础上，研究了冶金企业技术创新系统的复杂性及协同学特征。
